title: Liam Hemsworth seen with 'Dynasty' actress Maddison Brown post-Miley Cyrus split, reports say
text:
CLOSE Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth have called it quits less than a year into their marriage, 10 years after meeting on a movie set. USA TODAY

Looks like Liam Hemsworth has begun to "Slide Away" from his relationship with estranged wife Miley Cyrus.

About two months after the pair announced their split on Instagram, the actor, 29, was photographed holding hands with a woman while strolling through New York City Thursday. Us Weekly and TMZ identify Hemsworth's companion as Maddison Brown, 22, a model/actress who hails from Australia and portrays Kirby Anders on the CW's "Dynasty."

The outlets reported the twosome ate at the Italian restaurant Sant Ambroeus. TMZ published images of the outing. USA TODAY could not reach reps for Hemsworth and the "Dynasty" actress for comment.

Since their split, Cyrus, who exchanged vows with Hemsworth in December, has been romantically linked to "The Hills: New Beginnings" star Kaitlynn Carter and Australian musician Cody Simpson.

Miley Cyrus shows off her DIY hospital gown makeover after being laid up with tonsillitis

Jenna Dewan was 'just gutted' after Channing Tatum split: 'I didn’t know life without' him

Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth at the 2018 Vanity Fair Oscar Party in Beverly Hills. (Photo: Dia Dipasupil/Getty Images)

Last week, the singer called out the double-standard of men dating versus women dating on Twitter.

"Men (especially successful ones) are RARELY slut-shamed," Cyrus wrote. "They move on from one beautiful young woman to the next MOST times without consequence. They are usually referred to as 'legends,' 'heartthrobs,' 'G,' 'Ladies Man' etc.

"Where women are called sluts," she said. "I am just trying to thrive in a man's world. If we can't beat 'em, join 'em!"

On Aug. 12, Hemsworth shared news of the dissolution of his short marriage on Instagram. He said he wished his ex "nothing but health and happiness going forward."

Contributing: Bryan Alexander

description: Liam Hemsworth has begun to "Slide Away" from his relationship with estranged wife Miley Cyrus. Reports say he spent time with Maddison Brown.
